section.p: Holyamu blinks, and looks at you a little closer. 'Oh, it's you,' he says. 'How do you like your hair?' He laughs maniacally.

Holyamu will restore your hair to normal for 50 Shards if you want.
If so,
pay the 50 Shards
and delete the codeword Elk.

If you have the codeword Ethereal, .
If not, you can:

choices.choice: Ask him to lift a curse
